extracted-table.table-caption: Demographic and neuropsychological data of each group

caption.p: Demographic and neuropsychological data of each group

table-wrap-foot.p: Age, education, MMSE scores, MOCA scores, and GDepS scores were tested via analysis of variance (ANOVA), Kruskal-Wallis tests, two-sample t tests, or Mann-Whitney tests. Gender was tested via a chi-squared test
*Significantly different among the three groups (p < 0.05, ANOVA)
aSignificantly different between the HC and SCD groups (p < 0.05, two-sample t test)
bSignificantly different between the SCD and MCI groups (p < 0.05, two-sample t test)
cSignificantly different between the HC and MCI groups (p < 0.05, two-sample t test)
